sn1.26:1.3: Accept variant bhavantaṁ in this and similar passages. Bhagavantaṁ is hypermetrical.
sn1.26:2.2: With this, the Buddha contradicts Yājñavalkya, who posits two additional lights: speech (as when you can make your way in the dark by the sound of another’s voice) and the Self (Bṛhadāraṇyaka Upaniṣad 4.3).
